aws_access_key.description: The identifier of the access key

aws_secret_access_key.description: The secret associated to the access key

aws_region_name.description: The area hosting the AWS resources

description:
AWS is a one of the main cloud provider, supported by Amazon. It offers services for storage (S3, Glacier, EBS, ...), for networking (Snowball, CloudFront, ...), for computing (EC2, ECS, EKS, ...) and others.
This module provides triggers and connectors to collect events from AWS. It relies on the assumeRole authentication to interact with AWS services
name: AWS by AssumeRole
